title: Top 10 trending phones of week 41
description: Samsung Galaxy S24 FE's streak in our trending chart is at an end, but it's replaced on top by another Samsung smartphone. This week we've got the Galaxy A55 in first, followed by the Galaxy S24 Ultra. [#InlinePriceWidget, 13262, 1#] The Galaxy S24 FE rounds up an all-Samsung podium, but there are fresh new faces just below it. vivo's newly unveiled X200 Pro took fourth, followed by the X200 Pro mini in fifth. The exciting new Dimensity 9400-powered duo certain got enough attention even before its potential global launch. Apple's iPhone 16 Pro Max comes in sixth, ahead of...

html:
Samsung Galaxy S24 FE's streak in our trending chart is at an end, but it's replaced on top by another Samsung smartphone. This week we've got the Galaxy A55 in first, followed by the Galaxy S24 Ultra.

Samsung Galaxy S24 FE

These are the best offers from our affiliate partners. We may get a commission from qualifying sales.
128GB 8GB RAM$ 649.99$ 649.99
256GB 8GB RAM$ 709.99$ 709.99
Show all prices

The Galaxy S24 FE rounds up an all-Samsung podium, but there are fresh new faces just below it.

vivo's newly unveiled X200 Pro took fourth, followed by the X200 Pro mini in fifth. The exciting new Dimensity 9400-powered duo certain got enough attention even before its potential global launch.

Apple's iPhone 16 Pro Max comes in sixth, ahead of yet another Samsung phone - the Galaxy A15.

The final three spots all go to Xiaomi phones - the high-flying 14T Pro, followed by the mid-range Redmi Note 13 Pro and Redmi Note 14 Pro+.
